เกมที่ให้อารมณ์​โบ๊ะบ๊ะ เร้าใจ ตื่นเต้น เลือดสูบฉีด หัวอุ่น หัวเย็น วิ่งติด โดนโนวัน โดนเก็บยกตี้

In some ways pretty broken, but so much fun. Wether it's surviving with friends or going as killer. It has a huge amount of variety based on different killers and survivors. Especially hunting down survivors really gets my blood flowing. Matchmaking is pretty bad though, it'll pair up newbies with people that have over 2k hours and the balancing they're doing right now makes no sense to me, but as long as you're very incredibly competitive and easily frustrated it's a lot of game for the money and if you really get sucked in will give you 1000's of hours of entertainment (and hundreds of hours of swearing at bugs and BS lol). I would say as a beginner player you will get paired with killers way better than you for a while, but as a good beginner-killer after a couple dozen matches you will get paired up with noobs quite a lot and have the upper hand. Just the very first killer matches are hard.

Do recommend bc there is nothing like it that I know of. Would recommend waiting on a sale, it's 50% off very often and DLC's add up in cost quickly.
The game
muito do bom

Given that matches take only 10-15 minutes I should not have this many hours already.
- Don't need to buy the DLCs to play the game at the same level as everyone else, can grind for the in-game currency to purchase new characters, DLCs regularly go on sale on Steam for dirt cheap. +1
- This game is better with friends/other people to play with as a Survivor, encourages you to talk to people and may lead to touching grass, +1
- Rage quitting has a penalty, +1
- You can dress the evil drunk clown in an elephant costume called Mr. Puddles, +1
- Many different characters with different skills and perks to play as, both Survivor and Killer, with an customizable ability system, +1
- Doesn't need a 4,000$ gaming rig to run, ran this on my 500$ notebook no problem, just have to adjust settings.


- Every single Survivor you encounter in a Steve Harrington Ice Cream skin is convinced they're God's gift to gameplay, -1
- The Trickster exists, -1

Play how you want to play, not how others want you to play, and you'll have a good time 9 out of 10 times. The dev team is wishy-washy, and the community is questionable at best, but the game on its own is quite enjoyable & I recommend playing it with friends 100%.
搞耍遊戲 每天要玩

Addicting.

It's up to you to buy the DLCs or not, since the game is fun with or without them. Lastly, remember to have fun and try your best not to feel bad when your teammates let you down by abandoning you. Teamwork is necessary in this game, but so is the ability to weigh risks. I'm sure your teammates would've saved you had the situation not been that risky.

I don't know how I got here. If you read this, I'm stuck in a field right now, trying to get a generator working. It's cold and muddy. Please, there's this alien thing in the sky every time I look up. I wish this nightmare would end. I i... heard a scream from someone else stuck here like me.. I don't know what's out there..

O.. God, I found the person squirming on a hook, I took them down and gave them as much medical attention as I could. They said there's a butcher out there hunting us. I don't know but I'll stay quiet.

That's it!  I did it the last generator is up.. what's that noi.. ... .....
